TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ValueGeneratorCache extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ValueGeneration.IValueGeneratorCache

summary.para: Keeps a cache of value generators for properties.
This type is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

Docs.param: The property to get the value generator for.
The entity type that the value generator will be used for. When called on inherited properties on derived entity types, this entity type may be different from the declared entity type on
Factory to create a new value generator if one is not present in the cache.
Docs.summary: Gets the existing value generator from the cache, or creates a new one if one is not present in the cache.
Docs.returns: The existing or newly created value generator.
